document.full_text: ponder's no. 2 ranking on this list might be better described as "1-a," because if not for  injuries he might have put together the kind of year at f.s.u. that would have made him the clear-cut top qb prospect in this draft.
document.title: n.f.l. draft: christian ponder, second-ranked quarterback
lines_and_colors: ponder's no. 2 ranking on this list might be better described as "1-a," because if not for  injuries he might have put together the kind of year at f.s.u. that would have made him the clear-cut top qb prospect in this draft.
